description: This file defines the ReadingService class for interacting with reading progress data via an API in a Dart mobile application. It provides methods to retrieve and update reading progress for books.

classes.name: ReadingService
classes.description: A service class providing an interface to fetch and update reading progress data through an API client.

methods.name: getProgress
methods.description: Retrieves the reading progress for a specific book by its ID.

methods.name: upsertProgress
methods.description: Updates or inserts the reading progress data for a specific book with optional fields.
